Pre-Game Insights: Michael O’Neill is looking to build on the 2-0 win over Luxembourg and expects a tough game against Bulgaria.
Northern Ireland topped their group after the win over Luxembourg.
O’Neill acknowledges the real test of their progress will be playing against Bulgaria away from home.
The Bulgarian team is inexperienced, especially in the goalkeeping department.
Captain and striker Kiril Despodov is the most experienced player in the squad, having made 50 appearances for Bulgaria.
Bulgaria’s only win in their last 16 games was against Tanzania.
Filip Krastev, a midfielder, was sent off during the previous game against Belarus.
